sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示人的"能力，才能"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ability, capacity, capability, genius, talent, competence, faculty, gift, aptitude
means: ability ：普通用词，指人先天的或学来的各种能力。
capacity ：侧重指人的潜在能力，通常不指体力，多指才智，尤指接受与领悟能力。
capability ：多用于人，指胜任某项具体工作的能力，也指本身具有、尚未发挥的潜在能力。常与of或for连用。
genius ：语气最强，指天赋的高度才能与智力。
talent ：着重指人某方面具有可发展和倍养的突出天赋才能，但语意比genius弱。
competence ：正式用词，侧重指令人满意的业务能力与水平，达到胜任某项工作等的要求。
gift ：着重个人的天赋的才能或在某方面的显著本领，常暗含不能用一般规律作解释的意味。
aptitude ：多指先天或后天习得的运用自如的能力，常暗示接受能力强，能迅速掌握一种学术训练或艺术技巧。

word_mean: 能力：任何正常的能力或功能，尤指精神上的能力
〔大学〕教工：学院或大学的教授和讲师的同仁组织或团体

sentence.Network_en: Faculty members devote most of their time to scholarly research.
sentence.Network_cn: 全院教师大部分时间都用来从事学术研究。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French faculte, from Latin facultas, from facilis 'easy', from facere 'make, do'

entry.def: Your faculties are your physical and mental abilities.

example.ex: He was drunk and not in control of his faculties...
example.tran: 他喝醉了，浑身都不听使唤了。

example.ex: It is also a myth that the faculty of hearing is greatly increased in blind people.
example.tran: 盲人的听力会大幅增强也是一种谬谈。

entry.tran: (大学的)院系;(大学院系的)教职工
entry.def: A faculty is a group of related departments in some universities, or the people who work in them.

example.ex: ...the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences.

entry.tran: (大学、学院或院系的)全体教员
entry.def: A faculty is all the teaching staff of a university or college, or of one department.

example.ex: The faculty agreed on a change in the requirements...
example.tran: 全体教师一致同意修改规定。

example.ex: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
example.tran: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？

means.word_mean: 1. one of the inherent cognitive or perceptual powers of the mind
2. the body of teachers and administrators at a school;

sentences.sentence: "the dean addressed the letter to the entire staff of the university"

stems_affixes.word_buile: fac做,制作+ile能……的→能够做的→容易做的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [问题等的]侧面,一面;[多面体的]面

stems_affixes.word_buile: fac做,制作+ility→让人做事容易的东西
fac做,制作+simile相同→做出相同的东西→传真
fac做,制作+tor→促使人能够做的东西→要素,动力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 才能, 本领, 能力, 全体教员
流行式样[或货品],风尚,风气;样子,方式
stems_affixes.word_buile: fash=fac做+ion表名词→做出的东西→时髦

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使变得[更]容易;使便利;推动;帮助;处进
stems_affixes.word_buile: fac做,制作+ilitate能够→使能够做→容易

Sentence.sentence: Within academic departments, tenure(终身职位),combined with age-discrimination laws, makes faculty turnover—critical for a university to remain current in changing times—difficult.
And faculty members will be wary of any change that threatens the core curriculum in the name of moving students into the workforce
Another risk: the new campus schedules might eventually produce less revenue for the institution and longer working hours for faculty members.

jushi.english: The department of physics is in the Faculty of Science.
He lacks completely the faculty of self-criticism.
jushi.chinese: 他完全缺乏自我批评的能力。

jushi.english: The medical faculty is/are made up of doctors and nurses.
jushi.chinese: 全体医务人员由医生和护士组成。
